legal_basis: PAB must determine if there is an arguable ground for appeal
decision_reasoning: PAB required the Minister to 'establish' error and concluded no 'reasonable chance of success'
application_details: Judicial review initiated by Minister after PAB denied leave to appeal Review Tribunal's decision favoring Ms. Pelland
conclusion_outcome: Court allowed judicial review, directing PAB to reconsider application using the proper legal test
cause_of_action: Dispute over eligibility for survivor's pension due to interpretation of common-law relationship status
result_of_case: The PAB erred in law by applying the wrong test; the case is remanded for reconsideration under the correct standard
